title: How old is...? (free)
summary: How old is my baby? How old am I? No problem!
description: How old is my baby? How old am I? No problem!This app shows the exact age of an added person up to the minute. You can add as many persons you like.You are notified on special events (e.g. birthday or smooth numbers), also on your Android Wear gadget!With the share button, you can easily share the actual age of a person.The signs of the zodiac are being shown, if wanted.There is also a widget included.If you have wishes or find any bugs, please email me. Thanks a lot!Actual availiable languages: german, english, spanish (Thanks to S. Jäkel), turkish (Thanks to H. Özen), french (Thanks to N. Stelter), russian (Thanks to K. Gaar), polish (Thanks to J. Müller)
descriptionHTML:
How old is my baby? How old am I? No problem!
This app shows the exact age of an added person up to the minute. You can add as many persons you like.

You are notified on special events (e.g. birthday or smooth numbers), also on your Android Wear gadget!

With the share button, you can easily share the actual age of a person.

The signs of the zodiac are being shown, if wanted.

There is also a widget included.

If you have wishes or find any bugs, please email me. Thanks a lot!

Actual availiable languages: german, english, spanish (Thanks to S. Jäkel), turkish (Thanks to H. Özen), french (Thanks to N. Stelter), russian (Thanks to K. Gaar), polish (Thanks to J. Müller)
comments: Great app So easy to now remember who old they actually are lol
Super endlich weiß ich wie alt ich genau bin, super app!
Perfect Does exactly what it says on the tin and more!
Satisfied a curiosity of mine, and that's about it...
